pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Tannhäuser : Bayreuth Festival 1954 : radio broadcast, 1954-10-04 / Richard Wagner.
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Disc 1 and Disc 2, track 1: Josef Greindl (Hermann) ; Ramon Vinay (Tannhäuser) ; Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau (Wolfram von Eschenbach) ; Gré Brouwenstijn (Elisabetta) ; Herta Wilfert (Venus) ; Volker Horn (Shepherd) ; Josef Traxel (Walther) ; Toni Blankenheim (Biterolf) ; Bayreuth Festival Orchestra and Chorus ; Joseph Keilberth, conductor. Disc 2, track 2: Vienna Philharmonic Orchestra ; Hans Knappertsbusch, conductor.
